description: This is a nice walk for the family. Also In the area is a great 10 km paved path up the valley which is great for roller blading and biking.
directions: Take the Mt Seymour Parkway Exit from Hwy 1 in North Vancouver. Mt Seymour parkway is approx. 100m north of the north end of the second narrows bridge (aka. the Iron Workers Memorial bridge). Once getting onto Mt Seymour parkway get in the middle lane and continue straight onto Lillooet Rd. Follow Lillooet Rd for approx. 5 km until you reach the parking lot at the end of the road.
title: Rice Lake
